TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 1063-1064
TEI.2.document_title: J H Bell to James F Perry, 07-15-1834

barker_notes.barker_summary: Josiah H. Rell to James F. Perry, July 15, 1834. Suggesting action by the ayuntamiento in Austin's behalf.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1063-1064

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Josiah H. Rell to James F. Perry, July 15, 1834. Suggesting action by the ayuntamiento in Austin's behalf.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr. J. F. Perry*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Columbia */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="07-15-1834">July 15th 1834*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear sir*/p*
*p*I have understood that they have got a letter at *location_mentioned*St Philipi*/location_mentioned* from *person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned* givin information of his situation which is more inlarged than heretofore but is still in Confinement also requesting the several *person_mentioned*aumentoes [ayuntamientos]*/person_mentioned* to have a meeting for the purpose of making representations to the *person_mentioned*Gov */person_mentioned*and as I understand that ours is to be instald at this place on *date_mentioned n="07-19-1834">satterday next*/date_mentioned* I think it would be well for you to Come up and let us make a tryal to git sumthing on foot far his benefit I have talked with several whous opinions air entitled to Credit and all are anceous to attend to the affair and also are ancious that you should Come up I think it should be attended to as soon as possable and I will look for you up on *date_mentioned n="07-19-1834">satterday */date_mentioned*when we will have an oportunity of Consulting for the best— I send by *person_mentioned*Mr McNeal*/person_mentioned* some books for your little *person_mentioned*son */person_mentioned*I should be glad if *person_mentioned*Mr Pilgram*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*James */person_mentioned*could Come up at the same time as the peaches will be getting ripe if the[y] can not Come at that time at any rate by *date_mentioned n="07-26-1834">satterday week*/date_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. H Bell*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p*[Addressed:]*person_mentioned* J. F. Perry */person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Gulf Perie*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
